name: Massage
description: A classic relaxing massage to reduce stress and tension in the body.

name: Facial Treatment
description: A treatment to cleanse, moisturize, and rejuvenate the skin on the face.

name: Manicure and Pedicure
description: Beauty treatments to care for the hands and feet, including nail care and massage.

name: Body Scrub
description: An exfoliating treatment to remove dead skin cells and leave the skin soft and smooth.

name: Aromatherapy Treatment
description: A therapeutic treatment using essential oils to promote relaxation and well-being.

name: Hot Stone Massage
description: A massage treatment where heated stones are placed on the body to relax muscles and promote relaxation.

name: Deep Tissue Massage
description: A massage treatment that focuses on releasing deep-seated muscle tension and stiffness.

name: Acupuncture
description: A traditional Chinese treatment method involving the placement of thin needles on various points of the body to promote healing and well-being.

name: Yoga and Meditation Sessions
description: Group sessions or individual guidance to promote relaxation, flexibility, and peace of mind.
